greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Prime numbers arising from A057856.
comment: Conjecture: For all pairs of relative prime numbers (x, y) there exists at least one number n = 2^m and one prime number p such that p = x^n + y^n. This sequence shows one case of this conjecture where y = x + 1.
program: (PARI) a(n) = my(k=1); while (!isprime(p=(n+1)^k + n^k), k++); p; \\ _Michel Marcus_, Sep 16 2018
results.author: _Tomas Xordan_, Jun 02 2007
